participant_1.background:
I was able to use my fireworks collection to put on an amazing fireworks show for my friends.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
i watch youtube videos.

participant_2.background:
I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation.
I was so excited to finally graduate from college and start my career as a video game designer.
i m always hungry.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.
I've only been at my current job for a few months, but I'm already enjoying it.

content.text: Hey, how are you today?
Pretty well, how about you?
I'm doing well too. Did you do anything exciting recently?
Not really, just been working on my video game design. I'm almost done with my first project.
That's great! What's it about?
It's a puzzle game where you have to collect all the gems to win.
That sounds fun! Are you going to release it on Steam?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still working on it, but I might.
Well I'll be sure to check it out when you do.
Thanks! I'm glad you're interested.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and go out to eat.
Me too! What's your favorite movie?
I like a lot of movies, but I think my favorite is The Matrix.
That's a good one! I like the action and the special effects.
Me too! What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of games, but I think my favorite is World of Warcraft.
That's a classic! I used to play that a lot.
It's still fun! I've been playing it for years.
Have you ever been to Blizzard?
No, I've never been to their headquarters.
You should go sometime! It's a lot of fun
